overview: Ismael (Ismail Yassin) wants to marry Fathia (Shadia) but her father wants her to marry (Abdel Moneim Ismail). Fathia's father sends her to her aunt to keep her away from Ismael, and when he goes to look for her, he comes across a gang led by, Gasser who looks a lot like him.
title: The Honorable Thief
